column5: Now with Buster's out of commission, is there any place open in Vermillion Bay on Friday evening to grab a bite to eat?
We had breakfast at Quackers last Saturday. Good breakfast, can't comment on dinner. Seem like nice enough people. Fish On! Hooks
Contact Marcel at Birch Dale Lodge 807-227-5262. The Bullpit Steakhouse should be open. Less than 10 minutes off the Trans Canada Highway, 15 minutes or so from Vermillion Bay.
Temple Bay Lodge on Eagle lake (Eagle River area, east of VB). I highly recommend their Caesar's. 807-755-2172
X2. About every night we are there I get a double Caesar, extra spicy, with a cold LOTW Brewing Co. brewski or three. Their dinners are excellent.
You happen to know the serving hours for either of these places?

At Temple Bay, dinner is sort of staggered, so the whole camp isn't trying to eat at the same time. 4:45, 5, and 5:15 is typical. I was talking to a guy at the bar one night last June, and I recalled seeing him eating dinner alone. I was surprised to find out he lived in the area when I asked where he was from. I suggest calling the lodge 807-755-2172.
If you are driving through, there is a terrific coffee/bakery there on the north side of the highway the Comfort Table Bakery. they do french press coffee that is fantastic.
The fort in Vermillion bay is open till 9 everyday. They have decent food and reasonable prices. Mostly sandwiches and other light meals.
